00030 #ifndef __Win32EGLWindow_H__
00031 #define __Win32EGLWindow_H__
00032 
00033 #include "OgreEGLWindow.h"
00034 #include "OgreWin32EGLSupport.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre {
00037     class _OgrePrivate Win32EGLWindow : public EGLWindow
00038     {
00039     protected:
00040         virtual EGLContext * createEGLContext() const;
00041         virtual void getLeftAndTopFromNativeWindow(int & left, int & top, uint width, uint height);
00042         virtual void initNativeCreatedWindow(const NameValuePairList *miscParams);
00043         virtual void createNativeWindow( int &left, int &top, uint &width, uint &height, String &title );
00044         virtual void reposition(int left, int top);
00045         virtual void resize(unsigned int width, unsigned int height);
00046         virtual void windowMovedOrResized();
00047         virtual void switchFullScreen(bool fullscreen);
00048 
00049     public:
00050         Win32EGLWindow(Win32EGLSupport* glsupport);
00051         virtual ~Win32EGLWindow();
00052         void create(const String& name, unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00053                     bool fullScreen, const NameValuePairList *miscParams);
00054 
00055     };
00056 }
00057 
00058 #endif
